subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Test Design Patterns
msgSnippet: ... What might fail? What happened when you tried to write a test? J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that people
messageBody:
>So said tcxu on 2003-06-13 --------------------
>Can we use Junit to do unit test on the classes associated with
>Design patterns, e.g. the observer from Vince Huston.

What might fail?

What happened when you tried to write a test?


J. B. Rainsberger,
